name: analyze_metadata_mods_tool
description: Specialized tool for extracting MODS compliant metadata from document images. ONLY use for: library and archival documents requiring MODS (Metadata Object Description Schema) standard compliance, bibliographic descriptions, digital library metadata, and institutional repository processing. NOT for: general metadata, content analysis, text extraction, diagrams, or tables. If no MODS-relevant content is found, returns that no MODS metadata was detected and suggests checking with user for appropriate tool selection.

image_path.description: S3 URL (s3://bucket/key) or absolute file path to the image. Use this OR image_path, not both.

image_data.description: Base64-encoded image data. Use this OR image_path, not both. Preferred when image is already in memory.

aws_profile.description: Optional AWS profile name for Bedrock authentication. If not provided, uses default AWS credentials

result.description: Analysis result from Metadata Mods Analyzer
